document_data.name: ''Staff of Rejecting''
document_data.creator: [[Trobriand]]
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of rejecting''''' was a [[magic]] [[staff]] that could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
document_data.Description: This staff was made from [[ivory]] and weighed just {{SI|1|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers: The magic of the staff allowed the wielder to cast ''[[Trobriand's baleful teleport]]'' when expending two charges. These items were keyed to a specific location in [[Undermountain]] called [[Trobriand's Graveyard]] and could not but used to send a target to any other location.
document_data.History: The [[wizard]] [[Trobriand]] created several of these staves.
